title: Body Balance Essential Oil Blend
description: Our Body Balance Essential Oil blend is a combination of Lavender, Patchouli, Ylang Ylang III, Palmarosa, and Vetiver therapeutic essential oils. Body Balance Oil has a warm, rich, earthy, calming aroma and is used in a variety of products including aromatherapy, perfumery, soap, and other fine toiletries.
